description: This file is a React component for the 'Installation' page of a UI component explorer app. It provides setup instructions, code snippets, and guidance for configuring Tailwind CSS with the project, including both PostCSS and CLI setups, as well as CDN testing. The component renders a detailed documentation page with styled sections and code blocks.

methods.name: InstallationPage()
methods.description: React functional component exporting the Installation documentation page with setup guides, code snippets, and utility components.

ctags.name:
# Frontend environment
REACT_APP_API_BASE=
REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=
REACT_APP_FRONTEND_URL=

REACT_APP_NODE_ENV=development

REACT_APP_ENABLE_SOURCE_MAPS=true
REACT_APP_PORT=3000
REACT_APP_TRUST_PROXY=false
REACT_APP_LOG_LEVEL=info

REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS=
